Message:
In the letter, Her Holiness gave
permission for my friend
to accompany me.

She must have been
referring to Florence.

Thank goodness...
I was actually quite worried
about going alone.

If Florence is with me though,
I have nothing to fear...

the single most important
person to me.

she was far from scared,
holding me tight and
assuring me that
everything would be okay.
No matter what cruel trial awaits,

if the two of us are together,
I am sure we can overcome it.

Hoping to ease any fears
that still troubled us,

we grasped each other’s hands
tightly as we presented
ourselves to Her Holiness.

But, she took one look
at me and said...
